storyline.narrativeText: You are walking alone in on a cold night an dyou see a dark abandoned house. Do you go in?
You enter the house. Do you go upstairs, down to the basement, or stay on the main level?
You walk up the stairs and hear creaking. Curouisity getting the better of you, you continue to go upstairs. At the top of the stairs is a long hallway. Do you  turn left or turn right?

The kitchen is rundown and the cabinets are hanging on their hinges. You walk past, notivign nothing out of the ordinary. There is suddenly, a door to the backyard. Do you go outside or back to the main entrance.
storyline.context: You start walking and find your way into the kitchen.

storyline.narrativeText: To the right you see a trail of mice and to the left a trail of spiders. Which do you follow?
There are two doors down the hall. One straight ahead ajar and one to your left. Which do you choose to go into?
The floor suddently starts shaking... It gives out from under you.
storyline.optionAText: You fall backwards and hit your head fatally on the floor.

storyline.narrativeText: You see a dresser at the end of the room...something is in there...A ghost jumps out and knocks you off your feet
storyline.optionAText: You Have Been Killed by the Ghost

storyline.narrativeText: Suddenly the door shuts behind you. You hear footsteps outside the room... Something smells? You realize someone has set the room on fire and you are trapped
storyline.optionAText: You Have Died in the Fire

storyline.narrativeText: You follow the mice to a hidden ladder. Do you go up the ladder or follow the spiders?
storyline.context: The ladder takes you back to the main floor!

storyline.narrativeText: The spiders are getting bigger and bigger... Suddenly the spiders are so big they have swept you up and are carrying you through a cellar. Do you attempt to fight back and run or do you see where they take you?
storyline.optionAText: While fighting back you somehow hit the wall and the ceiling above you has started to crumble... you are stuck.

storyline.narrativeText: 3 days have passed and you are still stuck. You have died of dehydration
The spiders are your friends and have led you through a secret tunnel to escape! You have made it out alive!
